main event: On 7th February 1956, a civilian in Ft. Pierce, Florida, reported a visual sighting of a yellow colored object with a light colored dome or pulsating light below, estimated to be 1000 ft high and about 60 ft in diameter, moving from North to South. The object had six or more red lights around its periphery.
interesting points: The object was described as yellow with a light-colored dome or pulsating light below, with six or more red lights around the sides or periphery.
The object was estimated to be 1000 ft high and about 60 ft in diameter, suggesting it was a large, unusual craft.
Photographs were reportedly taken but are not available, raising questions about the evidence for this sighting.
The observer believed the sighting was generated by photographic flares, but the observer saw more than one object, creating uncertainty about the nature of the sighting.
The observer reported that the object remained stationary at times and then moved from North to South, exhibiting irregular behavior.
sighted object: yellow colored object with red lights
